donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The project focuses on:
i) Building institutional and stakeholder capacity to implement Reducing Emissions from Deforestation and Forest Degradation (REDD)
ii) Development of policy and legal framework for REDD+
iii) Development of capacity building for REDD benefit sharing
iv) Capacity building for Monitoring, Reporting and Verification (MRV) systems for REDD+ 
v) Development of the national REDD+ strategy

project_descr: United Nations Collaborative programme (United Nations Development Programme, United Nations Environment Programme, Food and Agriculture Organization) on Reducing Emission from Deforestation and forest Degradation in developing countries.
